channel.title: nextcloud on RBAC ATLAS
channel.description: Recent content in nextcloud on RBAC ATLAS

item.title: nextcloud
item.description:
Description

A file sharing server that puts the control and security of your own data back into your hands.

  • https://github.com/nextcloud/helm
  • https://github.com/nextcloud/docker

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
nextcloud-mariadb default ❌ — 0 1 —
nextcloud-postgresql default ❌ — 0 1 —
nextcloud-redis-master default ❌ — 0 1 —
nextcloud-redis-replica default ❌ — 0 1 —

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.
